src:
Jadwal Liga 1 Pekan Ke-27: Siaran Langsung, Top Skor, Klasemen
04 Nov 2019, 04:02 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Jadwal Liga 1 pekan ke-27 akan dimulai Senin ini, 4 November 2019. Laga Persela Lamongan vs Barito Putera akan jadi menu hari pertama.
Pekan ini, tim penghuni puncak klasemen, Bali United, akan berlaga di kandang PSS Sleman. Rival terdekatnya, Madura United, akan menyambangi Arema FC.
Persib Bandung akan bermain di kandang menjamu PSIS Semarang. Sedangkan Persija Jakarta akan menyambangi kandang Semen Padang FC.
Simak jadwal lengkap, top skor, dan klasemen:

Jadwal Liga 1 pekan ke-27

Senin, 04 November 2019Persela vs Barito Putera | 18:30 WIB (Ochannel)
Selasa, 05 November 2019Borneo FC vs Badak lampung | 18:30 WIB (Ochannel)
Rabu, 06 November 2019PSS Sleman vs Bali United | 15:30 WIB (Indosiar)PSM Makassar vs Kalteng Putra | 15:30 WIB (Ochannel)Persib vs PSIS Semarang | 18:30 WIB (Indosiar)
Kamis, 07 November 2019Persipura vs Bhayangkara | 15:30 WIB Semen Padang vs Persija | 16:00 WIB (Indosiar)
Jumat, 08 November 2019Arema FC vs Madura United | 18:30 WIB (Indosiar)
Sabtu, 09 November 2019Tira Persikabo vs Persebaya | 18:30 WIB (Indosiar).

Top Skor Liga 1

16 gol: Alex Goncalves (Persela), Marko Simic (Persija)14 gol: Makan Konate (Arema)13 gol: Beto Goncalvez (Madura United), E Bokhasvili (PSS Sleman), Ilija Spasojevic (Bali United)12 gol: Ciro (Tira Persikabo), Rafael Silva (Barito), Titus Bonai (Persipura).
Hasil pekan ke-26
Persija Jakarta 2-0 TIRA PersikaboMadura United 0-2 Persipura JayapuraBhayangkara FC 2-2 Semen PadangPSIS Semarang 3-0 PSS SlemanKalteng Putra 0-2 Persib BandungBadak Lampung 4-3 Arema FCBali United 1-1 Persela LamonganPS Barito Putera 1-0 Borneo FC.

text:
Week 1 League Schedule 27th: Live Broadcast, Top Scores, Standings
Nov 04 2019, 04:02 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - League Schedule 1 of Week 27 will start this Monday, November 4, 2019. The match between Lamongan vs Barito Putera will be the first day's menu.
This week, the team occupying the top of the standings, Bali United, will compete in the PSS Sleman enclosure. His closest rival, Madura United, will visit Arema FC.
Persib Bandung will play at home to host PSIS Semarang. While Persija Jakarta will visit the Semen Padang FC enclosure.
Check out the full schedule, top scores and standings:

League Schedule 1 of Week 27

Monday, November 4, 2019Perela vs Barito Putera | 18:30 WIB (Ochannel)
Tuesday, November 5 2019 Bristol FC vs Rhinoceros Lampung | 18:30 WIB (Ochannel)
Wednesday, November 6 2019 PSS Sleman vs Bali United | 15:30 WIB (Indosiar) PSM Makassar vs Central Kalimantan Putra | 15:30 WIB (Ochannel) Persib vs PSIS Semarang | 18:30 WIB (Indosiar)
Thursday, November 7, 2019 Persipura vs Bhayangkara | 15:30 WIB Semen Padang vs Persija | 16:00 WIB (Indosiar)
Friday, November 8, 2019Arema FC vs Madura United | 18:30 WIB (Indosiar)
Saturday, November 9, 2019 Persikabo vs Persebaya | 18:30 WIB (Indosiar).

Top League Score 1

16 goals: Alex Goncalves (Persela), Marko Simic (Persija) 14 goals: Eating Konate (Arema) 13 goals: Beto Goncalvez (Madura United), E Bokhasvili (PSS Sleman), Ilija Spasojevic (Bali United) 12 goals: Ciro (Madura United) Tira Persikabo), Rafael Silva (Barito), Titus Bonai (Persipura).
Week 26 results
Persija Jakarta 2-0 TIRA PersikaboMadura United 0-2 Persipura Jayapura Bhayangkara FC 2-2 Semen Padang PSIS Semarang 3-0 PSS SlemanKalteng Putra 0-2 Persib BandungBadak Lampung 4-3 Arema FCBali United 1-1 Persela LamonganPS Barito Putera 1-0 Borneo FC .
